title: Comp - post ubi confecti - Aen 5 362 and 365

content.description:
Post, ubi confecticonficio, -ere, -feci, -fectum: to finish cursus et dona peregitperago, -ere, -egi: to distribute,1
sic ait, et geminum pugnae proponitpropono, -ere: to propose honorem.
 1:The subject of peregit is Aeneas, and here Aeneas leads funeral games for his father, Anchises.↩
content.question: According to the passage, which event will come next?

unit.text: 5: Vergil's Aeneid, Excerpts from Books 4, 6, 7, 11, and 12
